column1: Growing number of studies found evidence the coronavirus can remain suspended in the air in aerosol particles. -intubating a patient can generate virus aerosols. - virus particles aerosolized with laboratory equipment remained viable for up to 3 hours while suspended in the air

WHO: Coronavirus outbreak is a “public health emergency,” which legally requires countries to ramp up their response to the crisis. US health officials expand screening to 20 ports of entry. US companies airlifting respirator masks, protective suits & nitrile gloves to Wuhan.
